projects.title: LMS Sekolah Alam
projects.description: A Learning Management System tailored for Sekolah Alam, facilitating digital learning and administration.
projects.challenges: Adapting the system to the unique environment of Sekolah Alam while ensuring a user-friendly interface for non-technical staff.

projects.title: SkyClub Rental System
projects.description: A comprehensive booking and management system for SkyClub sports fields.
projects.challenges: Coordinating with stakeholders to define requirements and ensuring the booking logic handled conflicting schedules accurately.

projects.title: OOP Learning Game
projects.description: A Crossy Road-style arcade game developed to apply and master Object-Oriented Programming concepts.
projects.challenges: Implementing core game mechanics using pure Object-Oriented Programming principles, specifically utilizing inheritance for diverse game objects and polymorphism for their behaviors.

projects.title: Property Website
projects.description: A real estate platform developed as a hands-on project to master the Laravel framework and MVC architecture.
projects.challenges: Understanding and implementing the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern effectively, along with mastering Laravel's Eloquent ORM for efficient database interactions.
